CustomField.description: CLAIMSV2-63 & CLAIMSV2-295: We need the date the offer was sent to the customer (whatever.) This is populated by Conga when the document is CREATED. If the agent doesn't send it right away, this may NOT be the date is was actually sent. This date is overridden if a SECOND document is generated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date the Offer document was created.
CustomField.label: Status Date: Offer Release Sent
